title: Oil Holds Biggest Jump Since October on Iran Conflict Concerns
description: Oil steadied after its biggest daily gain since October, following a report that American military intervention in Iran could come sooner than expected.
content: Oil steadied after its biggest daily gain since October, following a report that American military intervention in Iran could come sooner than expected.
